== /etc ==
After changes to anything under /etc (config file editing, packages installation and updates, etc.), it needs to be commited in the (local) bzr repository:
<pre>
/etc$ export BZR_EMAIL="yourname <yourname@example.com>"
/etc$ sudo -E add .
/etc$ sudo -E bzr commit -m "explain the changes here"
</pre>

== Server Down ? ==
When the server goes down, update DNS/domain redirection to BelgianTeam/ServerDown

== Drupal ==

See https://drupal.org/documentation for Drupal documentation.

Drupal (core) is installed as an Ubuntu package (<nowiki>[[http://packages.ubuntu.com/lucid/drupal6|drupal6]]</nowiki>). Its file shouldn't be modified.

Modifiable files for the website are configurations, contrib modules and custom ubuntu-be specific code located in <code>/etc/drupal/6</code>.
